name: InitialClaimsDC
surveyDefinition:
{ "pages": [ { "category": "Filing Eligibility", "elements": [ { "type": "radiogroup", "name": "workedForFederal", "tag": "Optimum RadioGroup", "title": "Have you worked for the Federal Government or the U.S. Postal Service as a civilian since <> ? You will need an SF8 form or an SF50 form.", "isRequired": true, "choices": [ "Yes", "No" ] }, { "type": "radiogroup", "name": "militaryService", "tag": "Optimum RadioGroup", "title": "Have you had any active military service since <>?", "isRequired": true, "choices": [ "Yes", "No" ] }, { "type": "radiogroup", "name": "workedInDC", "tag": "Optimum RadioGroup", "title": "Did you work in Washington DC between the dates of <> and <>?", "isRequired": true, "choices": [ "Yes", "No" ] }, { "type": "radiogroup", "name": "filingClaimFromDC", "tag": "Optimum RadioGroup", "title": "Are you filing this claim form within the District of Columbia?\n", "isRequired": true, "choices": [ "Yes", "No" ] } ], "name": "Filing Eligibility", "title": "Filing Eligibility" }, { "blockIf": "{militaryService} = 'Yes' or {workedInDC} = 'No'", "category": "Filing Eligibility", "elements": [ { "type": "panel", "name": "UCX Claim Message", "elements": [ { "type": "html", "name": "question2", "html": "
YOUR CLAIM CANNOT BE FILED OVER THE INTERNET
\n\nYou cannot file an initial claim for Regular Unemployment Compensation over the internet: " }, { "type": "html", "name": "question1", "visible": false, "visibleIf": "{militaryService} = 'Yes' ", "html": "
    \n
  • You were recently in the military
    • \n
" }, { "type": "html", "name": "question8", "visible": false, "visibleIf": "({workedForFederal}= 'No' and {workedInDC} = 'No')", "html": "
    \n
  • You worked outside the District of Columbia
    • \n
" }, { "type": "html", "name": "question7", "html": "\nIf you are a District of Columbia resident, you need to file your initial claim in person at one of our One Stop Centers. Claims are taken by appointment. To make an appointment, please call 724-7000. One Stop Centers which take initial claims are located at: \n
    \n
  • 5171 South Dakota Avenue, N.E., 2nd Floor
    • \n
  • 3720 Martin Luther King, Jr.Avenue, S.E.
    • \n
\n\nIf you are a Maryland resident, you may file your unemployment claim against the District of Columbia through the Maryland Unemployment Office by phone. The number is 301-313-8000.\n

\nIf you live in any other state, you should report to the nearest unemployment office in your state of residence to file a claim against the District of Columbia.\n" } ], "visible": false, "visibleIf": "{militaryService} = 'Yes' or ({workedForFederal}= 'No' and {workedInDC} = 'No')" } ], "name": "Military and Out of State Claim", "title": "Military and Out of State Claim", "visible": false, "visibleIf": "{militaryService} = 'Yes' or ({workedForFederal}= 'No' and {workedInDC} = 'No')" }, { "category": "Commuter", "elements": [ { "type": "radiogroup", "name": "commuteRelocateOutside", "tag": "Optimum RadioGroup", "title": "Did you recently relocate outside of the District of Columbia to your current address within the last two months?", "isRequired": true, "choices": [ "Yes", "No" ] }, { "type": "radiogroup", "name": "commuteRegular", "visible": false, "visibleIf": "{commuteRelocateOutside} = 'No'", "tag": "Optimum RadioGroup", "title": "Did you commute on a regular basis into the District of Columbia?", "isRequired": true, "choices": [ "Yes", "No" ] }, { "type": "radiogroup", "name": "commuteContinue", "visible": false, "visibleIf": "{commuteRegular} = 'Yes'", "tag": "Optimum RadioGroup", "title": "Do you plan to continue to commute into the District of Columbia to search for work? ", "isRequired": true, "choices": [ "Yes", "No" ] } ], "name": "Commuter", "title": "Commuter", "visibleIf": "<> = false" }, { "category": "Additional Information", "elements": [ { "type": "panel", "name": "panel3", "elements": [ { "type": "radiogroup", "name": "alienInformation", "tag": "Optimum RadioGroup", "title": "Are you a United State citizen?", "isRequired": true, "choices": [ "Yes", "No" ] }, { "type": "panel", "name": "panel4", "elements": [ { "type": "text", "name": "permitNumber", "tag": "Optimum SingleLine", "title": "If No, Please enter Alien Registration Number:", "isRequired": true, "size": 15 }, { "type": "text", "name": "permitExpirationDate", "tag": "Optimum Date", "title": "Alien Status Expiration Date", "isRequired": true, "inputType": "date" } ], "visible": false, "visibleIf": "{alienInformation} = 'No'" } ] }, { "type": "panel", "name": "panel5", "elements": [ { "type": "radiogroup", "name": "veteran", "tag": "Optimum RadioGroup", "title": "Are you a Veteran?", "isRequired": true, "choices": [ "Yes", "No" ] }, { "type": "panel", "name": "panel6", "elements": [ { "type": "multipletext", "name": "veteranDate", "tag": "Optimum StartEndDatepicker", "isLimitToCurrentDate": true, "startDateName": "Start Date", "endDateName": "Discharge Date", "title": "Veteran Start And Discharge Date", "isRequired": true, "items": [ { "name": "startDate", "isRequired": true }, { "name": "endDate", "isRequired": true } ] }, { "type": "dropdown", "choices": [ "Honorable", "General", "Good", "Satisfactory", "Indifferent", "Special Order", "Medical", "Dishonorable", "Bad Conduct", "Undesirable", "Dismissal", "Other than Honorable", "Active Service Member" ], "isRequired": true, "name": "veteranDischargeType", "tag": "Optimum Dropdown", "title": "If Yes, Select Service Discharge Type:" } ], "visible": false, "visibleIf": "{veteran} = 'Yes'" } ] } ], "name": "Personal Information", "title": "Personal Information" }, { "category": "Additional Information", "elements": [ { "type": "radiogroup", "name": "severancePayInformation", "tag": "Optimum RadioGroup", "title": "Are you or will you receive payment representing severance pay?", "isRequired": true, "choices": [ "Yes", "No" ] }, { "type": "panel", "name": "panel7", "elements": [ { "type": "text", "name": "severanceAmount", "tag": "Optimum Currency", "title": "Enter the total amount in dollars and cents: ", "isRequired": true, "requiredErrorText": "Please enter the Severance amount.", "size": 7 }, { "type": "multipletext", "name": "severancePayDate", "tag": "Optimum StartEndDatepicker", "startDateName": "Start date of the severance pay period", "endDateName": "End date of the severance pay period", "title": "Please enter the Severance pay period. ", "isRequired": true, "items": [ { "name": "startDate", "isRequired": true }, { "name": "endDate", "isRequired": true } ] } ], "visible": false, "visibleIf": "{severancePayInformation} = 'Yes'" }, { "type": "radiogroup", "name": "pensionInformation", "tag": "Optimum RadioGroup", "title": "Are you receiving, or have you applied for pension?", "isRequired": true, "choices": [ "Yes", "No" ] }, { "type": "text", "name": "pensionEffectiveDate", "visible": false, "visibleIf": "{pensionInformation} = 'Yes'", "tag": "Optimum Date", "isLimitToCurrentDate": true, "title": "If Yes, please enter the effective date of pension. ", "isRequired": true, "inputType": "date" }, { "type": "radiogroup", "name": "childSupportInformation", "tag": "Optimum RadioGroup", "title": "Are you required to pay child support??", "isRequired": true, "choices": [ "Yes", "No" ] }, { "type": "panel", "name": "panel8", "elements": [ { "type": "text", "name": "childSupportAmount", "tag": "Optimum Currency", "title": "If Yes, Enter the monthly amount in dollars and cents:", "isRequired": true, "size": 7, "placeHolder": "$ 1,000,000" }, { "type": "dropdown", "choiceUrl": "optimum-clientside-library/platform-services/dist/data/statesList.json", "choices": [ "item1", "item2", "item3" ], "isRequired": true, "name": "childSupportState", "tag": "Optimum Dropdown", "title": "If Yes, Enter the State" } ], "visible": false, "visibleIf": "{childSupportInformation} = 'Yes'" }, { "type": "radiogroup", "name": "withholdFederalTax", "tag": "Optimum RadioGroup", "title": "If you are paid benefits would you like us to withhold Federal income tax? (withholding is 10%)", "isRequired": true, "choices": [ "Yes", "No" ] }, { "type": "radiogroup", "name": "withholdStateTax", "tag": "Optimum RadioGroup", "title": "If you are paid benefits, would you like us to withhold District of Columbia Income tax? (withholding is 5%)", "isRequired": true, "choices": [ "Yes", "No" ] }, { "type": "radiogroup", "name": "filedUI", "tag": "Optimum RadioGroup", "title": "Have you filed for Unemployment in any state other than The District of Columbia Since <> ?", "isRequired": true, "choices": [ "Yes", "No" ] }, { "type": "dropdown", "choiceUrl": "optimum-clientside-library/platform-services/dist/data/statesList.json", "isRequired": true, "name": "filedUIState", "tag": "Optimum Dropdown", "title": "If Yes, please select the State where you have filed for Unemployment. ", "visible": false, "visibleIf": "{filedUI} = 'Yes'" }, { "type": "text", "name": "filedUIDate", "visible": false, "visibleIf": "{filedUI} = 'Yes'", "tag": "Optimum Date", "title": "If Yes, please enter the start date of the claim. ", "isRequired": true, "inputType": "date" } ], "name": "Eligibility Information", "title": "Eligibility Information" }, { "category": "Union/Recall Information", "elements": [ { "type": "radiogroup", "name": "unionBelong", "tag": "Optimum RadioGroup", "title": "Do you belong to a union? ", "isRequired": true, "choices": [ "Yes", "No" ] }, { "type": "radiogroup", "name": "unionHiringHall", "visible": false, "visibleIf": "{unionBelong} = 'Yes'", "tag": "Optimum RadioGroup", "title": "If yes, does your union have a hiring hall? ", "isRequired": true, "choices": [ "Yes", "No" ] }, { "type": "radiogroup", "name": "unionExclHiring", "visible": false, "visibleIf": "{unionHiringHall} = 'Yes", "tag": "Optimum RadioGroup", "title": "If yes, is it an exclusive hiring hall? ", "isRequired": true, "choices": [ "Yes", "No" ] }, { "type": "radiogroup", "name": "unionHaveRehireDate", "tag": "Optimum RadioGroup", "title": "Do you have a firm recall/rehire date to your most recent employer?", "isRequired": true, "choices": [ "Yes", "No" ] }, { "type": "text", "name": "unionRehireDate", "visible": false, "visibleIf": "{unionHaveRehireDate} = 'Yes'", "tag": "Optimum Date", "title": "If yes, enter the recall/rehire date (Month DD, YYYY): ", "isRequired": true, "inputType": "date" } ], "name": "Union/Recall Information", "title": "Union/Recall Information", "visibleIf": "<> = true or {commuteContinue} = 'Yes'" }, { "category": "Standard Form 8/Standard Form 50", "elements": [ { "type": "html", "name": "question3", "html": "To file an initial claim for unemployment compensation you should have at hand your Standard Form 8 (SF8) which is titled: \n
\n\"NOTICE TO FEDERAL EMPLOYEE ABOUT UNEMPLOYMENT INSURANCE\" \n
\nor Standard Form 50 (SF50) which is titled: \n
\n \"NOTIFICATION OF PERSONNEL ACTION\"" }, { "type": "panel", "name": "panel1", "elements": [ { "type": "radiogroup", "name": "sf8Information", "tag": "Optimum RadioGroup", "title": "Do you have at hand your Standard Form 8 or your Standard Form 50?", "isRequired": true, "choices": [ "Yes", "No" ] }, { "type": "text", "name": "agencyCode", "tag": "Optimum SingleLine", "title": "Please enter the 3-digit identification Federal Agency Code No. found in the middle of your SF8. If you do not have your Federal Agency Code No. located on your SF8, please enter your agency or employer name. If you enter your agency or employer name, the system will prompt you to select from a provided list.", "isRequired": true, "size": 3 } ] } ], "name": "Standard Form 8/Standard Form 50", "title": "Standard Form 8/Standard Form 50", "visible": false, "visibleIf": "{workedForFederal} = 'Yes'" }, { "category": "Standard Form 8/Standard Form 50", "elements": [ { "type": "panel", "name": "panel2", "elements": [ { "type": "html", "name": "question5", "html": "
It is important that you enter the employer for whom you last worked for at least 30 calendar days.
\n
\n
Failing to provide accurate employer information, including a valid mailing address, WILL result in a delay processing your claim.
" } ] }, { "type": "paneldynamic", "name": "federalEmployerInformation", "tag": "Optimum DynamicPanel", "title": "Federal Employer Inforamtion", "templateElements": [ { "type": "text", "name": To ensure your monetary determination is calculated properly to supply the name of all federal agencies you have worked for since April 1st 2017.
